definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Each family possesses at least three milk cows.
He can learn when each cow was milked and how much she produced.
sentences.chinese: 他能夠知道每頭奶牛何時擠奶，擠了多少奶。

sentences.english: The retained fetal membranes has caused great ecological damage to the breeding of dairy cows.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛產後胎衣不下對奶牛業造成極大的經濟損失。

sentences.english: The retained fetal membranes has caused great ecological damage to the breeding of dairy cows.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛產後胎衣不下對奶牛業造成極大的經濟損失。

sentences.english: Take a cookie, for example. Butter comes from cows and cows cost money.
sentences.chinese: 以曲奇爲例子，黃油來自奶牛，而奶牛需要用錢。

sentences.english: Take a cookie, for example. Butter comes from cows and cows cost money.
sentences.chinese: 以曲奇爲例子，黃油來自奶牛，而奶牛需要用錢。

sentences.english: The highest incidence of AD was observed from 2 to 4 parity.
sentences.chinese: 真胃變位的發生以2～4胎次的奶牛發病率最高。

sentences.english: She put a loop of rope around the cow's neck.
sentences.chinese: 她把繩圈套在了奶牛的脖子上。

sentences.english: Even if they built small, certainly no place to go Yang Nainiu.
sentences.chinese: 即使他們建成的小區，肯定也沒地方去養奶牛。

sentences.english: Hershey's Shelf Stable Milk is a Grade A milk procured from local family-owned dairies.
sentences.chinese: “好時”耐儲存牛奶是從本地奶牛場採購的A級牛奶。

sentences.english: 'to my thinking, the cows don't gie down their milk to-day as usual.
sentences.chinese: 照我看呀，今天這些奶牛出奶和平常有些不同。

sentences.english: But managing dairy and beef cows is a totally different thing.
sentences.chinese: 但管理奶牛和菜牛是完全不同的事情。

sentences.english: Which of the two cows that you keep produces more milk?
sentences.chinese: 你養的兩頭奶牛中哪頭牛產奶更多？

sentences.english: Inside the farmer's barn, a couple dozen cows stand listlessly in stalls.
sentences.chinese: 在農場的牛欄裏，十幾頭奶牛無精打采的站着。

definition: to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
